bill.title: Felonies Chargeable by Written Information; Prosecuting Attorney Package
bill.description: Adds felonies for which criminal charges may be instituted by written information including habitual property crime, unauthorized entry in a dwelling in the first or second degree, and theft of copper. Effective 01/07/59. (SD1)

history.action: (H) Prefiled

(H) Bill scheduled to be heard by JUD on Tuesday, 02-07-12 2:00PM in House conference room 325.
